TopicTitle: Top Gear in KSP - Hover Van!

Articles.Content: Here is the new and improved Top Game, the Top Gear parody in game! Tonight, we attempt to make a Hover van, review the Ford Focus RS and even have Some 'News!' All in this parody of Top Gear! Thanks for reading/looking, if there is anything I could improve/make better please let me know! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) TheBlockRoom
